TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CommandEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Command`就會引發事件時或按一下控制項時。The `Command` event is raised when a or control is clicked. 物件包含有關資料`Command`事件可以存取在事件處理常式。The object contains data about the `Command` event that can be accessed in the event handler. 使用中可用的屬性類別，您可以判斷要執行這類的命令名稱`Sort`，除了選擇性引數，會補充說明命令，例如`Ascending`。Using the properties available in the class, you can determine the name of the command to perform, such as `Sort`, in addition to an optional argument that supplements the command, such as `Ascending`. 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何存取中的屬性來判斷要執行的命令。The following example demonstrates how to access the properties in to determine the command to perform. 這個範例會指定事件處理常式以宣告方式，使用屬性控制項。This example specifies the event handler declaratively, using the property of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定事件處理常式，並以程式設計方式將它加入至事件中`Page_Load`方法。The following code example demonstrates how to specify the event handler and programmatically add it to the event in the `Page_Load` method. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommand/CS/buttoncommandcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommand/VB/buttoncommandvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體類別使用指定物件。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class using the specified object. 執行個體時建立呼叫這個建構函式時，由下列屬性會初始化為指定的值。When an instance of is created by a call to this constructor, the following properties are initialized to the specified values. |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |CommandNameCommandName|`e.CommandName` 參數。The `e.CommandName` parameter.| |CommandArgumentCommandArgument|`e.CommandArgument` 參數。The `e.CommandArgument` parameter.| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立和初始化的新執行個體類別使用指定物件。The following example demonstrates how to create and initialize a new instance of the class using the specified object. [!code-csharp[Classic CommandEventArgs.CommandEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CommandEventArgs.CommandEventArgs Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CommandEventArgs.CommandEventArgs Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CommandEventArgs.CommandEventArgs Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 使用指定的命令名稱和引數，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified command name and argument.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體類別使用指定的命令名稱和引數。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class using the specified command name and argument. 執行個體時建立呼叫這個建構函式時，由下列屬性會初始化為指定的值。When an instance of is created by a call to this constructor, the following properties are initialized to the specified values. |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |CommandNameCommandName|`commandName` 參數的值。The value of the `commandName` parameter.| |CommandArgumentCommandArgument|`argument` 參數的值。The value of the `argument` parameter.| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立和初始化的新執行個體類別使用指定的命令名稱和引數。The following example demonstrates how to create and initialize a new instance of the class using the specified command name and argument. [!code-csharp[Classic CommandEventArgs.CommandEventArgs1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CommandEventArgs.CommandEventArgs1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CommandEventArgs.CommandEventArgs1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic CommandEventArgs.CommandEventArgs1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CommandArgument As Object
public: property System::Object ^ CommandArgument { System::Object ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the argument for the command.
A that contains the argument for the command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以包含由程式設計人員將任何字串。The can contain any string set by the programmer. 屬性補充屬性可讓您提供命令的任何其他資訊。The property complements the property by allowing you to provide any additional information for the command. 例如，您可以設定屬性`Sort`並設定屬性`Ascending`，指定要以遞增順序排序的命令。For example, you can set the property to `Sort` and set the property to `Ascending` to specify a command to sort in ascending order. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷要執行的命令的補充資訊。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine supplemental information for the command to perform. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CommandName As String
public: property System::String ^ CommandName { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the name of the command.
The name of the command to perform.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷要執行的命令。Use the property to determine the command to perform. 屬性可以包含由程式設計人員將任何字串。The property can contain any string set by the programmer. 程式設計人員可以識別程式碼中的命令名稱並執行適當的工作。The programmer can then identify the command name in code and perform the appropriate tasks. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來以程式設計方式判斷要執行的命令。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to programmatically determine the command to perform. [!code-aspx-csharp[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/CS/buttoncommandnamecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[ButtonCommandNameArgument#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ButtonCommandNameArgument/VB/buttoncommandnamevb.aspx#1)]
